ElementGetAttributeNodeNS.summary: The getAttributeNodeNS() method of the interface returns the namespaced node of an element.

remarks.para:
This method is useful if you need the namespaced attribute's instance properties.
If you only need the namespaced attribute's value, you can use the method instead.
If you need the node of an element in HTML documents and the attribute is not namespaced, use the method instead.
